appropriateMethodTypography: Please select the appropriate method to refund your amount  *
appropriateMethodDescription: Since the payment was made through COD, please select the appropriate method to refund Your amount.
howToSendItBackTypography: How would you want to send it back? *
parcelDeliveryInfo: The parcel will be picked up by our courier partner from the address it was delivered to
noteText: We aren’t able to offer policy exceptions in response to comments. Do not include personal information as these comments may be shared with external services providers to identify product defects.
